entry.title: CVE-2024-6531 Rejected reason: This was not a security issue in Bootstrap. Bootstrap’s JavaScript is not intended to sanitize unsafe or intentionally dangerous HTML. As such, the reported behavior fell outside the scope of Bootstrap’s security model, and the associated CVE has been rescinded.
CVE-2024-6485 XSS in Bootstrap button component
CVE-2025-7425 Libxslt: heap use-after-free in libxslt caused by atype corruption in xmlattrptr
CVE-2025-7424 Libxslt: type confusion in xmlnode.psvi between stylesheet and source nodes
CVE-2025-10911 Libxslt: use-after-free with key data stored cross-rvt
